title: Knock Down
text:
A model suffering the knock down condition :

- y Loses -3 AGI (note that AGI cannot be reduced below 1).

- y Cannot attack or make Parting Blows, and cannot engage enemy models. They can, however, still be engaged by enemy models.

- y Cannot Advance , use Active Abilities, or spend any other AP (including 0AP actions) until they have used Cleanse or Stand Up to remove the condition .

- y Does not contribute to the 'Distracted' or 'Ganging Up' attack dice modifiers. Note: Innate and common abilities can still be used .

- y Cannot Effigy Recall .

- y Has a height of 1.
